title: Search continues after 4 people shot at Coachella party
content:
The shooting was reported at 11:45 p.m. near Bagdad Avenue and Douma Street. Officers arrived to the area and found evidence of a shooting on the 84000 block of Bagdad Avenue, but no suspects were found, according to police.
The victims included a 15-year-old girl, an 18-year-old man, 19-year-old man and a 25-year-old man. Officers said none of their injuries were life-threatening and they were later released from the hospital.
All of the shooting victims were taken to the hospital by friends.
Anyone with information regarding the shooting should call the Coachella Police Department at 760-836-3215. KESQ and CBS Local 2 will deliver more details as the investigation moves forward.
